summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4632 for the improvement of 9th Avenue South, from Dearborn Street to Plummer Street; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53903, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
